content: आवेशः {@--1@} Entering into, entrance; आवेशं कृ <ls>Pt. 1</ls> to enter or infuse oneself into. {@--2@} Taking possession of, influence, exercise; स्मय° influence of pride <ls>R. 5. 19</ls>; so मदन°, क्रोध°, भय° &c. {@--3@} Intentness, devotedness to an object, complete absorption in one wish or idea. {@--4@} Pride, arrogance. {@--5@} Flurry, agitation, anger, passion; <ls>K. 291.</ls> {@--6@} Demoniacal possession. {@--7@} Apoplectic or epileptic giddiness.
